attributes.comment:
Dear CMS Friends:

Please consider adding CSV (or similar) to FHIR API as an open and available access method to any NDH development. The most underserved and less abled stakeholders in health often find the fees and costs of solutions built around FHIR API to be a barrier to access. Inclusion of CSV will allow the possibility that forms of NDH access can emerge that are more functionally "open" to practical access to those who need and seek care, but lack sufficient standing or resources.

Thank you for your compassion and consideration!
